description: Unus the Untouchable (Gunther Bain, born Angelo Unuscione) is a fictional character from the comic book X-Men and part of the Marvel Comics Universe. A mutant, Unus is named for his ability to consciously project a force field which protects him from harm.
name: Unus the Untouchable
secretIdentities: Angelo "Unus" Unuscione; legally changed to Gunther Bain
